dialogue.text: Excuse me! It was you two who just entered, correct?
Yes, that was us! We were wondering if you've seen anybody come by lately? We're looking for this Riolu's friend.
I see... unfortunately, many Pokemon enter our guild everyday to ask for help on our Bulletin Board.
It'd be impossible to find who you're looking for in the crowd of Pokemon rushing in.
Hmm... is it okay if we looked at the Bulletin Board ourselves to see if she stopped by?
Apologies, but jobs from the board are reserved for our Exploration Teams only!
You can't accept any unless you're a part of the guild!
Then we'll join! We'll do anything to find who we're looking for!
Excellent! In that case, follow me and we'll get your team all signed up!
